slider.title: Flokicoin Testnet Faucet
slider.tagline: Play to test. Earn for fun.
slider.description: Remember the T-Rex game when the internet went out? Now that offline moment earns you free testnet Flokicoin, no connection drop required :D

reward.title: Run Complete ‚Äî Coins Unlocked
reward.subtitle4: Every run counts. Score more, earn more üöÄ

retry.subtitle1: You didn‚Äôt reach the minimum of {{minScore}} FLC.

errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

item1.title: Can I play without setting up a testnet wallet?
item1.description: Yes! You can start right away without setting up a wallet. We provide a shared testnet address for quick testing ‚Äî ideal for first-time users. Note that this address resets regularly and is not suitable for long-term tracking or claiming. Use it only if you don't want to connect your own wallet:

item2.title: How do I install tWallet?
item2.description: You can get tWallet from the GitHub repo at https://github.com/flokiorg/tWallet or use the plug-and-play version via the toolchain at https://myfloki.com. Once installed, create a new wallet or import an existing one.

item3.title: How do I enable the testnet in tWallet?
item3.description: To enable the testnet in tWallet, create a file called `twallet.conf` in the same folder as your tWallet app. Inside that file, add this line: `testnet = true`. You can copy a sample config from: https://github.com/flokiorg/tWallet/blob/main/sample-twallet.conf

item4.title: Where can I see my testnet transactions?
item4.description: Use the Flokicoin testnet explorer to view your wallet balance, faucet claims, and block status. https://testnet.flokichain.info

item5.title: Are testnet coins real or usable on mainnet?
item5.description: No ‚Äî testnet Flokicoins are only for development purposes. They have no real-world value and cannot be used or traded on mainnet.

item6.title: How often can I claim testnet coins?
item6.description: You can claim after each run that meets the score requirement. Claims are included in the next mined block. If no one claims, no block is mined.

item7.title: Why didn‚Äôt I receive my coins right away?
item7.description: Claims are submitted to the mempool and need to be included in the next mined block. If the faucet is idle, mining pauses until someone makes a claim.

item8.title: Can I play the game on mobile?
item8.description: Yes, the game works on mobile.

item9.title: Do I need to sign anything to claim?
item9.description: No wallet signature is required. Your connected address is automatically registered when your run qualifies for a claim.

item10.title: Can I mine blocks for the testnet?
item10.description: Yes! If you run a Flokicoin testnet node with mining enabled, your node can help include faucet claims in blocks and support the testnet network.
